document.p: DNS rules allows you to define DNS rules.
The DNS rules provides the following information:
document.li1:
Slider
Allows you to enable or disable the rule.

Domain
Match DNS queries based on a domain name.

DNS Set
Name of the DNS set, which must be associated with a logical network interface or default to use the default DNS servers.

Policy
Match DNS queries based on a connection mark or any to match everything.

Out Policy
Allows you to select policy on outgoing connection.
document.p: Under the DNS rules, click Add new DNS rule
